# API Surface: validators

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

| Name | Type | Description | Location |
|------|------|-------------|----------|
| validateACCoverage | function | Validates acceptance criteria coverage for an increment by parsing spec.md and tasks.md, building traceability matrices, and calculating coverage metrics | ac-coverage-validator.ts |
| FormatPreservationValidator | class | Validates sync operations to ensure external items maintain their original format, blocking modifications to titles, descriptions, and ACs for format-preserved items | format-preservation-validator.ts |
| isCoveragePassing | function | Checks if coverage report passes validation based on minimum coverage percentage and orphan task rules | ac-coverage-validator.ts |
| getRecommendedActions | function | Generates recommended actions based on coverage report gaps | ac-coverage-validator.ts |
